result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Paul Eric Fjorden

records.addlTxt:
CASES: 19CF413, 20CF233, 20CF334 & 22CF399. 10:06 AM Defendant Paul E Fjorden in court, in custody.  Attorney Benjamin James Webster in court for State of Wisconsin. CW-clerk. 
Def states he does not qualify for SPD, has called Atty Murtaugh for reappointment. Application for ct appt'd counsel provided again to def (in court). Fjorden-requesting modification of bond. CT is denying request for bond modification. JA to set for next hearing once counsel has been appt'd. Bonds cont. 10:13 am adj.
Review scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 07:00 am.

BOND COVERS 19CF413, 20CF233, 20CF334 & 22CF399. No contact with L.H. or T.S. Not to possess or consume alcohol. Not to possess or consume controlled substances without a prescription and only in amount prescribed. No drug paraphernalia. Subject to testing to determine compliance upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive.
Status conference on October 25, 2022 at 10:00 am.

CASES: 19CF413, 20CF233, 20CF334, 22CF399. 1:18 PM Defendant Paul E Fjorden appeared by video from PCJ, in custody. Attorney Derek Sanders appeared by video specially.  Attorney Benjamin James Webster in court for State of Wisconsin. RL-clerk. CT quashes warrant. Def is advised of options to obtain counsel. Atty Sanders- unsure if def qualifies. Def to contact PD's office. If def does not qualify for PD and is unable to hire own counsel, def may file petition for ct appt attorney. ADA requests $5000 cash bond. CT sets bond. 1:25 pm adj.
Status conference scheduled for October 25, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Warrant returned by dispatch - Defendant in custody in Polk County Jail

1:05 PM Defendant Paul E Fjorden not in court.  Attorney Benjamin James Webster in court for State of Wisconsin. CW-clerk. Warrants previously issued & will remain in place. CT-any cash bond that has been posted is ordered forfeited at this time. ADA joins in the court's motion. 1:06 pm adj.

CASES: 19CF413, 20CF233, 20CF334 & 22CF399. 11:30 AM Defendant Paul Eric Fjorden not in court.  Attorney Benjamin James Webster in court for State of Wisconsin. CW-clerk. 
Cases called earlier today, new cash bond set to cover all files. $500 was to be posted within 1 hour. The def still has not posted the bond. ADA-find warrants to be appropriate. CT is revoking bond on these files. Warrants auth, WI & MN. 11:34 am adj.

$500 CASH BOND WAS NOT POSTED. 
BOND HAS BEEN REVOKED.

$1000 HAS BEEN POSTED. $500 TO BE POSTED BY 10:30 a.m. today. 
BOND COVERS 19CF413, 20CF233, 20CF334 & 22CF399. No contact with L.H. or T.S. Not to possess or consume alcohol. Not to be in any bars/taverns.  No controlled substances without a prescription and only in amount/frequency as prescribed. Subject to testing to determine compliance upon reasonable suspicion.
Scheduling conference on October 3, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

CASES: 19CF413, 20CF233, 20CF334 & 22CF399. 9:13 AM Defendant Paul E Fjorden in court.  Attorney Benjamin James Webster in court for State of Wisconsin. CW-clerk. 
CT-warrants quashed. Def states he has spoke to counsel, unsure of what his name is. Def states he never received application for ct appt'd counsel. 
Warrants are quashed. 9:31 am adj.
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 3, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

CASES: 19CF413, 20CF233, 20CF334  22CF399. 8:40 AM Defendant Paul E Fjorden not in court.  Attorney Benjamin James Webster in court for State of Wisconsin. CW-clerk. 
ADA-request warrant on all files. CT-warrants auth all files, nationwide. 8:41 am adj.

10:27 AM. JL-Clerk. Defendant Paul Eric Fjorden not in court.  Attorney Benjamin James Webster in court for State of Wisconsin. State req warrant, geo to WI/MN. CT authorizes warrant but stays it until 8:30 am on 9-27-22.  10:30 am adj.
Review hearing scheduled for September 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Review hearing on September 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Not to possess or consume alcohol. Subject to testing to determine compliance upon reasonable suspicion.

1:07 PM. JL-Clerk. Defendant Paul Eric Fjorden appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Benjamin James Webster in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Derek W Sanders in court for Paul Eric Fjorden. De does not qualify at this time. Application for court appointed counsel sent to jail. State req $500 cash bond. CT sets bond. 1:13 pm adj.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on September 26, 2022 at 10:00 am.
